content: create a stylish berry harvest bandana cowl with this easy crochet pattern perfect for all skill levels this pattern features pineapple lace for a seamless and versatile design worked flat in one piece from the top down this triangle-shaped cowl is written with a detailed pattern and includes a video tutorial and chart **unique features-** easy crochet pattern suitable for all skill levels detailed written pattern with video tutorials and a charted diagram lovely pineapple crochet stitch for added flair **materials needed-** hook 5mm us size 8 0 yarn dk weight 100% superwash merino 246 yds optional large button
